snippet: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes an amusement park in Rye, N.Y.; a prayer service for Sherpa guides; and storm clouds over the Brooklyn Bridge.
abstract: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes an amusement park in Rye, N.Y.; a prayer service for Sherpa guides; and storm clouds over the Brooklyn Bridge.
